neighbors.name: Jeffrey Boyce
neighbors.claims: Jeffrey Boyce is identified as the owner of parcel 16.-1-1.112 in the Town of Elba, Genesee County ([Genesee County Planning Dept](https://www.geneseeny.gov/files/content/county/v/12/department-content/planning/agricultural-and-farmland-protection/2025-03-18-meeting-packet.pdf)). Public records and meeting minutes do not indicate any active role in local government or public statements regarding development projects ([Town of Oakfield](https://townofoakfieldny.gov/town-officials/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowner; no public role identified

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out with a personal, one-on-one approach at his property, emphasizing respect for farmland use and how the project will preserve rural character.

neighbors.profile_summary: Jeffrey Boyce is a private landowner in Genesee County with no documented public stance on development.

citations.claim: Identified as owner of parcel 16.-1-1.112 in the Town of Elba
citations.title: Genesee County Agricultural and Farmland Protection Board Meeting Packet

citations.claim: No active role in local government found
citations.title: Town of Oakfield Officials

neighbors.name: Brice Johnson
neighbors.claims: Brice Johnson is a participating landowner in the Cider Solar Farm project, having signed a lease agreement with Hecate Energy Cider Solar LLC in January 2023 ([NYS DPS](https://documents.dps.ny.gov/public/Common/ViewDoc.aspx?DocRefId={C04B4D91-0000-C72D-923C-C58FC173D7D1})). He serves as a Board Member for the Genesee SnoPackers, a local snowmobile club ([Genesee SnoPackers](https://geneseesnopackers.com/index.php/club-information/boardofdirectors/)). He is the son of the late Esther Johnson, a long-time resident of Oakfield ([The Daily News](https://www.bataviafuneralhomes.com/obituaries/esther-johnson-22)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Board member of local recreational club; participating landowner in major energy project

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage as a project participant and community leader; leverage his role in the SnoPackers to understand recreational land use concerns.

neighbors.profile_summary: Brice Johnson is a participating landowner in the Cider Solar project and serves on the board of a local snowmobile club.

citations.claim: Signed a lease agreement with Hecate Energy Cider Solar LLC in January 2023
citations.title: Cider Solar Farm Project Parcels Agreement Summary

citations.claim: Serves as a Board Member for the Genesee SnoPackers
citations.title: Genesee SnoPackers Board of Directors

citations.claim: Son of the late Esther Johnson, long-time resident
citations.title: Obituary of Esther Johnson

neighbors.name: Ellen Hersee
neighbors.claims: Ellen Hersee is a resident of Oakfield, NY, residing at 3718 Lockport Road ([National Public Data](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/h/ellen-hersee/)). She holds no known local government position and has not been publicly noted in development debates ([Town of Oakfield](https://townofoakfieldny.gov/town-officials/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Resident with no identified public leadership role

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a respectful, face-to-face discussion focusing on the projectâ€™s minimal intrusion and assurances that rural peace will be maintained.

neighbors.profile_summary: Ellen Hersee is an Oakfield resident with no documented public stance on development.
